title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2014 St.Petersburg Bitcoin Bowl Polo Shirt & PatchSTARTING BID: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 15th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: What size is that polo my man?  If I can fit in it, I'd be much more likely to keep the bidding going.  Regardless, the patch alone is pretty sweet.  This shirt looks like it's been worn a few times but that patch appears to still be in the original packaging.  Is that true?  I don't want to assume anything and wouldn't mind hearing a few more details on these items.0.0011BTCGood luck on the bidding all!

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on October 11, 2022, 09:13:06 PM0.0011BTCCurrent high bidQuote from: OgNasty on October 11, 2022, 09:13:06 PMWhat size is that polo my man?  If I can fit in it, I'd be much more likely to keep the bidding going.  Regardless, the patch alone is pretty sweet.  This shirt looks like it's been worn a few times but that patch appears to still be in the original packaging.  Is that true?  I don't want to assume anything and wouldn't mind hearing a few more details on these items.It appears to be a "Large", but is hard to make out. The label is printed on the neck of the shirt in grey print that is very hard to read.From what I remember, it was sold "new without tags", but yes agree does appear worn.. maybe by one of the coaches/sideline people.If someone is savvy with Worthpoint.com, can maybe dig it up, as ebay doesn't keep records that long.....The patch is new and it appears you can still buy them from at least 2x sites:https://www.theemblemsource.com/products/bitcoin-st-petersburg-bowl-patch?variant=29199131181133https://patchcollection.com/products/bitcoin-st-petersburg-bowl-game-jersey-patch-ucf-vs-nc-state-2014Figured this was a fun addition to the auction that SatsLife is running for his bowl coin here:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5416661.0Here is a close up of the label of the shirt:

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: comit on October 14, 2022, 09:11:49 PM0.0035 BTCWinnerThank you for the bids
